info.title: Azure Log Analytics Client for LinkTargets, StorageInsightConfigs and SavedSearches.
info.description: .Net client wrapper for the REST API for Azure Log Analytics

put.description: Create or update a storage insight.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: Resource Group name of the Log Analytics Workspace

parameters.name: workspaceName
parameters.description: Log Analytics Workspace name that will contain the storageInsightsConfigs resource

parameters.name: storageInsightName
parameters.description: Name of the storageInsightsConfigs resource

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The parameters required to create or update a storage insight.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: Resource Group name of the Log Analytics Workspace

parameters.name: workspaceName
parameters.description: The name of the workspace that contains the storage insight.

parameters.name: storageInsightName
parameters.description: Name of the storageInsightsConfigs resource

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: Resource Group name of the Log Analytics Workspace

parameters.name: workspaceName
parameters.description: Log Analytics Workspace name that will contain the storageInsightsConfigs resource

parameters.name: storageInsightName
parameters.description: Name of the storageInsightsConfigs resource

get.description: Gets the first page of storage insight instances in a workspace with the link to the next page.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: Resource Group name of the Log Analytics Workspace

parameters.name: workspaceName
parameters.description: Log Analytics Workspace name that will contain the storageInsightsConfigs resource

get.description: Gets a list of accounts with administrator privileges that are not associated with an existing workspace.

delete.description: Deletes the specified saved search in a given workspace.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: Resource Group name of the Log Analytics Workspace

parameters.name: workspaceName
parameters.description: Log Analytics workspace name

parameters.name: savedSearchId
parameters.description: The id of the saved search.

put.description: Creates or updates a saved search for a given workspace.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: Resource Group name of the Log Analytics Workspace

parameters.name: workspaceName
parameters.description: Log Analytics workspace name

parameters.name: savedSearchId
parameters.description: The id of the saved search.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The parameters required to save a search.

get.description: Gets the specified saved search for a given workspace.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: Resource Group name of the Log Analytics Workspace

parameters.name: workspaceName
parameters.description: Log Analytics workspace name

parameters.name: savedSearchId
parameters.description: The id of the saved search.

get.description: Gets the saved searches for a given Log Analytics Workspace

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: Resource Group name of the Log Analytics Workspace

parameters.name: workspaceName
parameters.description: Log Analytics workspace name

get.description: Gets the results from a saved search for a given workspace.

parameters.description: Resource Group name of the Log Analytics Workspace

parameters.name: workspaceName
parameters.description: Log Analytics workspace name

parameters.name: savedSearchId
parameters.description: The id of the saved search.

post.description: Gets the schema for a given workspace.

parameters.description: Resource Group name of the Log Analytics Workspace

parameters.name: workspaceName
parameters.description: Log Analytics workspace name

post.description: Gets the search results for a given workspace.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: Resource Group name of the Log Analytics Workspace

parameters.name: workspaceName
parameters.description: Log Analytics workspace name

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The parameters required to execute a search query.

post.description: Gets updated search results for a given search query.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: Resource Group name of the Log Analytics Workspace

parameters.name: workspaceName
parameters.description: Log Analytics workspace name

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the search that will have results updated.

customerId.description: Gets or sets the unique ID of the account.

accountName.description: Gets or sets the name of the account.

workspaceName.description: Gets or sets the DNS valid workspace name associated with the account.

location.description: Gets or sets the Azure region that the account was created in.

Account.description: Metadata for an Operational Insights account that isn't linked to a workspace.

Name.description: Gets or sets the tag name.

Value.description: Gets or sets the tag value.

Tag.description: A tag of a saved search.

DisplayName.description: Gets or sets the display name.

Version.description: Gets or sets the version number.

Tags.description: Gets or sets the tags attached to the saved search.

SavedSearchProperties.description: Value object for saved search results.

etag.description: Gets or sets the etag of the saved search.

properties.description: Gets or sets properties of the saved search.

SavedSearchCreateOrUpdateParameters.description: Parameters for creating/updating a saved search

id.description: Gets or sets the id of the saved search.

etag.description: Gets or sets the etag of the saved search.

properties.description: Gets or sets properties of the saved search.

GetSavedSearchResult.description: Value object for saved search results.

Status.description: Gets or sets the status of a core summary.

NumberOfDocuments.description: Gets or sets the number of documents of a core summary.

CoreSummary.description: The core summary of a search.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the field the search query is sorted on.

order.description: Gets or sets the sort order of the search.

SavedSearchMetadataSchema.description: Metadata items for saved search items.

RequestId.description: Gets or sets the request id of the search.

resultType.description: Gets or sets the search result type.

total.description: Gets or sets the total search results.

top.description: Gets or sets the number of top search results.

id.description: Gets or sets the id of the search results request.

CoreSummaries.description: Gets or sets the core summaries.

Status.description: Gets or sets the status of the search results.

StartTime.description: Gets or sets the start time for the search.

LastUpdated.description: Gets or sets the time of last update.

ETag.description: Gets or sets the ETag of the search results.

requestTime.description: Gets or sets the request time.

aggregatedValueField.description: Gets or sets the aggregated value field.

aggregatedGroupingFields.description: Gets or sets the aggregated grouping fields.

id.description: Gets or sets the id of the saved search.

etag.description: Gets or sets the etag of the saved search.

properties.description: Gets or sets properties of the saved search.

SavedSearchValue.description: Value object for saved search results.

__metadata.description: Gets or sets the metadata from search results.

value.description: Gets or sets the array of result values.

type.description: Gets or sets the error type.

message.description: Gets or sets the error message.

id.description: Gets or sets the id of the search, which includes the full url.

__metadata.description: Gets or sets the metadata from search results.

value.description: Gets or sets the array of result values.

SearchResultResponse.description: The get search result operation response.

displayName.description: Gets or sets the display name.

indexed.description: Gets or sets the boolean that indicates the field is searchable as free text.

stored.description: Gets or sets the boolean that indicates whether or not the field is stored.

facet.description: Gets or sets the boolean that indicates whether or not the field is a facet.

ownerType.description: Gets or sets the array of workflows containing the field.

__metadata.description: Gets or sets the metadata from search results.

value.description: Gets or sets the array of result values.

pre.description: Gets or sets the string that is put before a matched result.

post.description: Gets or sets the string that is put after a matched result.

top.description: Gets or sets the number to get from the top.

highlight.description: Gets or sets the highlight that looks for all occurences of a string.

query.description: Gets or sets the query to search.

start.description: Gets or sets the start date filter, so the only query results returned are after this date.

end.description: Gets or sets the end date filter, so the only query results returned are before this date.

SearchParameters.description: Parameters specifying the search query and range.

id.description: Gets or sets the Azure Resource Manager ID of the storage account resource.

key.description: Gets or sets the storage account key.

state.description: Gets or sets the state of the storage insight connection to the workspace

StorageInsightStatus.description: The status of the storage insight.

containers.description: Gets or sets the names of the blob containers that the workspace should read

tables.description: Gets or sets the names of the Azure tables that the workspace should read

storageAccount.description: Gets or sets the storage account connection details

status.description: Gets or sets the status of the storage insight

eTag.description: Gets or sets the ETag of the storage insight.

StorageInsight.description: The top level storage insight resource container.

value.description: Gets or sets a list of storage insight instances.

@odata.nextLink.description: Gets or sets the link (url) to the next page of results.

StorageInsightListResult.description: The list storage insights operation response.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
